name: SKOverlay.AppConfiguration
desc: An object that represents the attributes of an overlay you use to recommend another app on the App Store.

items.name: init(appIdentifier: String, position: SKOverlay.Position)
items.desc: Creates an object that represents the attributes of an overlay you use to recommend another app on the App Store.

items.name: var appIdentifier: String
items.desc: The iTunes identifier of the recommended app.

items.name: var position: SKOverlay.Position
items.desc: The position of the overlay on the screen.

items.name: enum SKOverlay.Position
items.desc: Constants that identify the position of an overlay on the screen.

items.name: var userDismissible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user can dismiss the overlay.

items.name: var campaignToken: String?
items.desc: A token you use to represent an ad campaign and measure its effectiveness.

items.name: var providerToken: String?
items.desc: A token that represents the provider of an app promotion campaign, and that you use to measure the campaign’s effectiveness.

items.name: func setAdditionalValue(Any?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets an additional value for a key; for example, a value for measuring the effectiveness of an ad campaign.

items.name: func additionalValue(forKey: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the object associated with the key.

items.name: var latestReleaseID: String?
items.desc: The release ID of the latest version of your app as displayed in App Store Connect.

items.name: var customProductPageIdentifier: String?
items.desc: An optional identifier for an app’s custom product page.
